author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Plane crashes into bakery in Colombia, 5 killed and 7 injuredTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Plane crashes into bakery in Colombia, 5 killed and 7 injured Published  
Five people were killed and a bakery set on fire when a small plane crashed in Colombia, authorities said.Three minutes after taking off from the Colombian capital’s airport, the plane crashed into a residential area of Bogota.
It was flying to the town of Guaymaral, 12 miles from Bogota.The pilot and his three passengers died.One person was killed inside the bakery and seven others suffered burns, including a 12-year-old girl, officials said.This is the third incidence of small plane crash in Bogota in three months. Three people were killed in August when an aircraft crashed in the Cajica area, and three more died in October when a plane smashed on to a highway.
